articles.title: Trump travel ban barring citizens from 12 countries takes effect - BBC
articles.description: The White House says the ban will "protect Americans from dangerous foreign actors".
articles.content:
Lucy Clarke-Billings
President Donald Trump's sweeping new travel ban which bars citizens of 12 countries from entering the United States came into effect at 00:00 ET (05:00 BST) on Monday. 
The or… [+3234 chars]
